message:
# ðŸš€ PARALLEL COORDINATION DEMO - LIVE!

## Mission: Build 3 Services Simultaneously

Watch at: http://localhost:8888

## Session Assignments:

### Session A (any available):
**Task:** Enhance I-MATCH service
**Claim:** service/i-match (2h)
**Work:** Add new matching algorithm documentation

### Session B (any available):
**Task:** Enhance AUTO-FIX-ENGINE
**Claim:** service/auto-fix-engine (2h)  
**Work:** Add automated testing framework

### Session C (any available):
**Task:** Enhance DEPLOYER service
**Claim:** service/deployer (2h)
**Work:** Add multi-environment support

### This Session (Current):
**Task:** Orchestrator - coordinate all work
**Role:** Send messages, monitor progress, update dashboard

## Coordination Protocol:

1. Each session claims their service
2. Each session sends heartbeat every 2 min
3. Sessions message on completion
4. Watch everything LIVE on dashboard!

## Timeline:
- T+0: Broadcast plan
- T+1: Sessions claim work
- T+2: Work begins (parallel!)
- T+3-10: Heartbeat updates visible on dashboard
- T+10: Completion messages

## Success Metrics:
âœ… 3 claims active simultaneously
âœ… 3+ sessions showing progress bars
âœ… Messages flowing in real-time
âœ… All visible at http://localhost:8888

Let's go! ðŸš€
